on-the-rocks.name: On The Rocks
cards: Test?

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
What’s a habit, compulsion, 
or relationship you wish you 
could quit?

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
Have you ever stolen 
anything? What, and 
why? Do you still have it?

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
Do your best (or worst) 
impersonation of me.
I promise to clap 
appreciatively.

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
What’s something you’ve 
done to try and be cool?

A
B
Describe the first time we 
met. What was your honest

you’ve ever had to do at

A
B
If I didn’t have my current 
job, what do you see me 
doing?

A
B

Then describe your last kiss.

bathroom-related disaster.

A
B

not?

A
B

B

B

B

B

B

A
B

B

A
B

A
B

B

B

B

B

B

A
B

A
B

If someone offered you

A
B

How do you answer?

think people should never 
joke about?

A
B
Tell us about the one that 
got away.

happened? How do you

A
B

Assuming you were single,

secret that you’ve let slip

A
B

you really disappointed 
someone. Did you ever 
earn back their trust?

person here? Give us

A
B

A
B

impacted your life—but 
may not know about.

you tried to save or repair 
a relationship?

A
B

struggling with that we

you say about me? Would
it all be true?

A
B

lied to your parents. Did

romantically.

A
B

in a lie? Did you confront 
me about it? Why or why 
not?
Tell us about a time you 
shot someone down 
romantically.

A
B
Help me with my ten-year

mistake?

A
B
Do you have any scars you 
want to show us? Pick one 
and tell us the story behind 
how you got it.
When was the last time 
you lied to me? What was 
the lie?

A
B
How many kids is too 
many kids? How many
will you have?
Of the people here, who
do you think makes the
most money? What makes 
you think so?

What would we do on 
our first date? (If asking 
partners or exes: What did 
you do on your first date?)
Have you ever pooped 
yourself as an adult?
A
B

happy-hour.name: Happy Hour
cards:
THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.

compliments.

Everybody else answers.
What’s the best compliment 
you’ve ever been given?

Everybody else answers.

proud of that not many 
people know about?

Everybody else answers.

kicked?

B

in concert that you hated
just to make me happy?
Have you?
When do you think you 
peaked?

A
B
If I were a perfume or 
cologne, what would my top, 
heart, and base notes be?
Do you ever just let me win?

A
B
What best represents me as a 
friend: a weighted blanket, a 
spin class, or a wine tasting?
We’re starting a business. 
What venture would we be 
most successful at as a pair?

A
B
What’s the most kickass 
you’ve ever felt?
If we formed a gang,
what would the name
of our posse be?

A
B
What’s the most fun you’ve 
ever had with strangers?
Tell us the story.
What do you wish you were 
as good at as me?

A
B
What is something you know
you’ll accomplish, no matter 
how many people tell you 
you can’t?
If someone did me wrong, 
would you (a) comfort me,
(b) distract me, or (c) get 
revenge for me?

A
B
What makes you so much fun?
If you could live anyone 
else’s life, whose would it be?

A
B
How many seconds is the 
ideal hug? Should we all test 
your hypothesis?
What is the most comforting 
sound in the world?

A
B
Describe an act of petty 
protest you waged at work 
or school.
What’s one thing you can 
start doing to put more 
beauty back into the world?

A
B
What’s something that 
completely changed you 
when you encountered it
for the first time?
Do you ever pity-laugh at my 
jokes, even if you don’t think 
they’re funny?

A
B
What discontinued item 
would you give anything
to bring back?
Would you trust me
to pierce your ear, 
80’s-sleepover style?

A
B
I’m going to have permanent 
art deposited into my skin 
with needles. Pick a design 
for me. Bonus points if you 
draw it.
What’s the biggest fear 
you’ve overcome?

A
B
What smell takes you back 
to childhood?
Do you brag about me to 
other people? What do
you say?

A
B
You suddenly become 
wealthy beyond the dreams 
of avarice. What do you do 
with the rest of your life?
What’s the weirdest 
compliment you’ve ever 
gotten?

A
B
What would be your cheesy, 
20-second, game-showcontestant anecdote?
If I couldn’t reach an itch, 
would you do me a solid
and scratch it?

A
B
What’s guaranteed to hit
you right in the feels?
If you were a Care Bear, 
what would be on your belly?

A
B
We’re road tripping through 
the middle of nowhere. 
Do you have me drive or 
navigate?
What was your first 
impression of me? Has it 
turned out to be the case?

A
B
What’s the hold music
for your brain?
Liking what piece of pop 
culture gets someone your 
automatic stamp
of approval?

A
B
What’s the strangest 
nickname you’ve ever
been given?
Of all the things we do 
together, what is the best
thing we do together?

A
B
You get to travel back in time 
to warn me about one thing. 
What would it be?
If we were flying somewhere together, who 
would volunteer to sit
in the middle seat?

A
B
What did you think you 
would hate, but ended up 
loving?
What album have you spun 
the most times? Be honest. 
You can consult your music 
apps for verification.

A
B
What do you secretly think 
I’d be amazing at?
Who here is most likely to 
believe in supernatural, 
occult, or mystical stuff?

A
B
Tell me about a disagreement we had—and how we 
resolved it. Has it made us 
stronger?
What is your greatest stylerelated regret as an adult? 
Have you glo’d up since?

last-call.name: Last Call
cards:
THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
Does our relationship bring 
out the best in you? In me?
If not, why?

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
What’s something you resent 
about me?

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
Describe three ways to 
improve my physical 
appearance and general 
attractiveness.

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
Describe a time you lost a 
little bit of respect for me.

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
What percentage of the time 
do you think I’m completely 
full of shit?

THIS ROUND’S ON ME
Everybody else answers.
Do you even remotely care 
what I think of you?

A
B
Do you think I’m more or less 
honest than you are?
Do you ever put me down to 
make yourself feel better?

A
B
What’s a fundamental 
difference between us,
and will we ever resolve it?
Do you think I’ll ever do 
anything worth being 
remembered by society?

A
B
Where are we, and what are 
we doing, in ten years? Have 
we honestly improved each 
other’s lives?
Have you ever harassed 
someone online? Do you 
think they deserved it?

A
B
If someone was interested in 
dating me, what thing about 
me would you tell them to 
change their mind?
What have I ruined for you?

A
B
What problem do I think I’m 
successfully hiding from 
everyone, but is actually 
completely obvious?
Do you see us as equals?

A
B
What do you wish I’d just 
shut up about?
Do I often seem like I’m
being fake?

A
B
Do you think I’m good parent 
material?
What thing do I love that you 
absolutely hate?

A
B
What negative thing have 
I said about you that’s 
haunted you forever?
What one change could 
I make that would vastly 
improve who I am as a 
person?

A
B
What ethical boundaries
are you happy to cross?
Am I too picky? Too petty? 
Too selfish?

A
B
Have you ever considered 
ending our relationship? 
Why?
What’s the most amount of 
money you would lend me?

A
B
Do you ever think I need
to cut back on drinking
or drugs?
What’s the most needlessly 
mean thing you’ve ever 
heard me say about 
someone else?

A
B
Have I ever done anything 
you think should have gotten 
me shitcanned?
Are there certain situations 
with me you avoid on 
purpose?

A
B
What’s the most egregious 
lie you’ve ever told me?
Do you think I’m too clingy or 
demand too much attention?

A
B
What personal demon are 
you in denial of?
Do you think I’m continuing 
to grow, or is this the best
I’ll ever be as a person?

A
B
What advice do I need but 
don’t want to hear?
Do you think I’m capable of 
doing something you could 
never forgive me for?

A
B
Are you sometimes 
embarrassed to be seen
with me? Why?
What do I never seem to 
understand about you?

A
B
Do you think I have 
overachieved or 
underachieved?
What will you never 
understand about me?

A
B
Name one thing I do that 
disgusts you.
How have I disappointed you?

A
B
Have you ever hurt someone 
on purpose?
What do you think I need
to just let go of?

A
B
Name a time you wished we 
weren’t friends.
Who’s someone we know 
that you wish I was more
like and why?

A
B
Do you ever feel like I’m 
holding you back?
If I was in a relationship with 
someone you hated, would 
you tell me?

A
B
Is there anything about
me that creeps you out?
Would you hire me?

A
B
Do you have any secrets you 
keep from me and me only?
Is there an expiration date
on our relationship?

A
B
Have I often struck you as 
immature or unable to take 
care of myself?
Do you think I sometimes 
takes advantage of other 
people?

A
B
What do I think I’m great at, 
but am actually terrible at?
Have you ever been 
genuinely scared of me?

A
B
What’s the most serious 
crime you’ve ever 
committed?
What is (or would be) the 
worst thing about having me 
as a travel companion?

A
B
What’s the worst thought 
you’ve ever had that you’ve 
never shared with anyone?
Do you think I’m a bully?

A
B
What’s the bitchiest thing 
you’ve ever said about me 
behind my back?
Name a time you could have 
helped someone, but didn’t 
bother.

A
B
What’s the most selfish
thing you’ve ever done?
What’s stupidest thing 
you’ve ever heard me say?

A
B
What’s an offensive opinion 
you will never let go of?
Do you think you’re better 
than me?

A
B
If you do something you 
know is wrong, but don’t get 
caught, do you keep doing it?
What’s the longest period
of time you could spend with 
me before never wanting to 
see me again?

A
B
Have you ever stolen 
anything from me?
What’s the weirdest thing 
about me?

A
B
If I died tomorrow, what 
regrets would you have 
about our relationship?
Have you ever knowingly let 
me embarrass myself, even if 
you could have stopped it?

A
B
Do you sometimes lie about 
being busy if you don’t want 
to deal with me?
Would you trust me alone 
with your kids for more
than a couple hours?

A
B
Do you ever warn people 
about me before they
meet me?
Do you ever have to fake 
empathy?

A
B
Have you ever ghosted 
someone you were close 
with?
What’s the most annoying 
thing I do without realizing it?

A
B
What am I the most ignorant 
about?
Do you ever think I stir up 
drama because I enjoy it?

A
B
What’s something you know 
would make you a better 
person, but you just don’t 
want to do it?
Have you ever stabbed 
someone in the back or 
actively plotted against 
them?

A
B
Is this the best I’ve looked 
since you’ve known me?
What’s the worst thing 
you’ve ever done to an 
animal?

A
B
How have I changed for the 
worse since we’ve met?
What’s the most 
unreasonable thing you’ve 
ever completely lost your 
shit over?

A
B
What’s the most terrible 
thing you’ve ever done
for money?
How have you dishonored 
your parents?

A
B
In what ways have you
used me?
Have you ever had to 
apologize to someone
for my behavior?

A
B
Have you ever intentionally 
scammed someone or misled 
them for personal gain?
If someone important to you 
said they’d stop seeing you 
unless you stopped seeing 
me, would you?

A
B
Name a time you thought I 
was weak.
When was the last time you 
were out of control?

A
B
When have you let your 
pride get in the way of
doing the right thing?
Have you ever forced 
someone to do something 
against their will?

A
B
Have you ever pretended 
to be someone else on the 
internet?
Would your life be any worse 
if we had never met?

A
B
Have you ever lied on
a resume?
What have you done while 
intoxicated that you wish 
you could take back?

A
B
What’s the angriest you’ve 
ever been at me?
If we lived across the country 
from each other, do you think 
we’d lose touch?
